articles.title: Shakira cheers son Milan on at his baseball game as ex Gerard Piqué watches from across the field - Daily Mail
articles.description: Shakira, 45, stepped out to support her son Milan, nine, at his baseball game in Barcelona, Spain on Saturday - as her ex Gerard Piqué , 35, looked on from across the field.
articles.content:
Shakira stepped out to support her son Milan at his baseball game in Barcelona, Spain on Saturday - as her ex Gerard Piqué looked on from across the field.
